$nos.title: $NOS
$nos.subtitle: The Social Token
$nos.paragrapho: Our social token the $NOS comes from the Brazilian expression “É noix” which reaffirms the sense of community that binds a huge part of our youth. However, the term is translated into Spanish, being extracted from the expression "Nosotros", (nós).
$nos.paragrapho_2: All we have is us.” Emicida.
